actions.text: Clean Bill H.R.4915 Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee in Lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the program of grants for the prevention and control of sexually transmitted diseases.

summary.text: Revises provisions of the Public Health Service Act relating to grants concerning acquired immune deficiency syndrome and concerning sexually transmitted diseases. Authorizes appropriations for sexually transmitted disease projects and programs for FY 1988 through 1990.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the program of grants for the prevention and control of sexually transmitted diseases.
